# HLTV ~~(kinda)~~ API
## Project description
<br />

HLTV-fetch is just my fan project that I'm doing while learning bs4 and stuff

<br />

# Install

```
pip install hltv-fetch
```

# Usage

**Get live matches**
```
get_live_matches()
```

**Get future matches**
```
get_future_matches(date) #date is dd.mm.yyyy
```
(thats all for now)
